column5: Nice Fish!  You guys starting your guiding business yet?
Nice catch carole..!!!!    great pic too,nice size winter steel  cheers
Congrats, nice looking steel and a great way to start the season...  Mike
Wtg  Carole a beauty for sure.

Well, as many of you know, night fishing is when we catch most of our nice fish.  I checked out a local trib on the way home from work late this afternoon and noticed that there were a few (emphasis on few), open stretches of water.  After we put the little one to bed, we headed off with our float rods to see if we could catch anything swimming around.  The waters were ultra clear and pretty low tonight, so we didn't have high hopes.  I've been out a few times this winter and had some success, so I was really hoping that she would catch something this time out.  At about 920pm, her float goes down and I hear her say "Fish on!!".  After a quick fight, she landed her first of the year....a nice 25.5 inch steelie...also her first qualifying OFAH entry as well.  Here's the pic...can you tell she's happy??? LOL
He does look happy!
Way to go Carole, that is a nice steelie  Joey
HE??   You are referring to the fish right??
Way to go Carole!!!! I guess there isn't much point in asking how Cliff did?
Dude that fish Rocks .
nice one,congrats
WTG Carole... How'd you do tonight Cliff ? The teasing begins. Glad to hear ya both got to get out onto the river
Finally,  Cliffs a handsome guy but it's good to see your face again!!  Beauty!
Gorgeous fish. Nice one!
NICE WORK BLY!!! A WINTER NIGHT STEELIE!!! I HAVENT EVEN DONE THAT YET  LOL
Nice looking fish....  WTG Carole....
Nice Night fish !!!
Off to a good start, WTG...
Beauty!
Way to go!!! Nice fish!
way to go!  Great catch!  Cheers!
Good Job Bly. Nice fish.  Ken
awesome fish bly!  bring on spring!  Cheers, UF

Great report!... and Excellent pic, fish and smile!!!  I knew it was only a matter of time before Bly opened up her can of Whoop-Ass! on you in the fishin department Cliff.  You get to go fishin' more often when you let her catch the biggest fish... don'tcha?
Nice fish Bly.  Congrats and looking forward to more reports which I am sure will be forthcoming.
w00t! Way to go Carol!  G
WOW !!!...Nice fish Bly...
Very nice, Carole, great smile on the both of you!
Awsome fish there.  Great way to start the '08 season.  reefrunner
